fields.title: Chuze
fields.short_description: Chuze changes the way you shop for groceries. It helps you save time, money and improve your shopping experience.
fields.text: Chuze changes the way you shop for groceries. It helps you save time, money and improve your shopping experience.

fields.title: Waterbalance for Apple Watch
fields.short_description: An Apple Watch app that allows you to track your daily water intake even more easily. Eventually it helps you to turn drinking water into a healthy habit.
fields.text: An Apple Watch app that allows you to track your daily water intake even more easily. Eventually it helps you to turn drinking water into a healthy habit.

fields.title: Keypr
fields.short_description: Keypr is a new word in the hotel industry. This embedded software brings an understanding of what it means to be a quality hotel service.
fields.text: Keypr is a new word in the hotel industry. This embedded software brings an understanding of what it means to be a quality hotel service. Keypr enables guests to check in/out of the room, order room service, find the nearest restaurants, order a taxi and even check their guest info in the hotel – all this in only a few clicks. You don’t need to make calls or wait in queue – all you need is on the Keypr Android tablet in your room!

fields.title: iOS Development
fields.short_description: Our experienced iOS engineers will help you to shape your vision of a future iPhone or iPad app.
fields.text: To succeed in the App Store today you must deliver absolutely the best experience to end users! Apps should be perfectly designed, intuitive, responsive, and fulfill user needs. We are ready to work as your adviser and consultant to guide you through the whole process of mobile app development, starting from ideation, UI/UX, design, engineering and right up to publication in the market. Our experienced iOS engineers will help you to shape your vision of a future iPhone or iPad app. Usually, the iOS platform is the #1 priority for many mobile app development projects. We have been furnishing our clients with robust, technically proficient and aesthetically attractive iOS apps for iPhone and iPad since 2009. We successfully implemented projects on the following fronts: Lifestyle, Education, Health & Fitness, Photo & Video, Finance, Social Networking, Travel, Entertainment and more.

fields.title: Android Development
fields.short_description: Our team can develop an Android app for your mobile product from scratch or help your iOS app easily migrate to the Android platform.
fields.text: We started Android application development in 2009 after the platform expanded globally. When working with us you don’t have to worry about Android platform fragmentation and different screen resolutions - your app will be carefully tested and will work seamlessly on the most popular Android devices. Our team can develop an Android app for your mobile product from scratch or help your iOS app easily migrate to the Android platform. When porting to Android, we use native components and Android design. We started Android application development in 2009 and since that time have developed and launched a bunch of successful apps. Our team gained experience in the implementation of complex projects in different categories, including Lifestyle, Education, Health & Fitness, Media & Video, Photography, Finance, Social, Shopping, Travel & Local, Entertainment and others. We have also worked with high-tech tasks: audio processing, geolocation, video processing and animation. Each project gave us precious experience.

fields.title: О Prom.ua
fields.short_description: Prom.ua – это всеукраинский торговый центр в интернете – уникальная для Украины торговая площадка с конструктором сайтов.
fields.text: Prom.ua – это всеукраинский торговый центр в интернете – уникальная для Украины торговая площадка с конструктором сайтов. Prom.ua позволяет покупателям выбрать из огромного количества предложений, а компаниям разместить информацию о предоставляемых товарах и услугах. Портал начал свою работу в 2008 году, а в 2009 году привлек инвестиции от холдинга Naspers - одной из крупнейших компаний в области электронной коммерции в мире. Сегодня на платформе Prom.ua создали свои сайты более 508 339 компаний, которые разместили 33 511 999 товаров и услуг в каталоге портала. Наша миссия: «Мы помогаем предпринимателям  продавать, а потребителям покупать товары и услуги». Prom.ua для покупателя - это место удобных покупок, где можно комфортно выбрать и купить все необходимое на одном интернет-ресурсе.

fields.title: Продавцам
fields.text: Если вы хотите продавать товары/услуги, создать сайт или интернет-магазин на Prom.ua – звоните по телефону +380 (44) 392 85 00 Или зарегистрируйтесь, ваш персональный менеджер ответит на любые вопросы и поможет вам.

fields.title: Покупателям
fields.text: На Prom.ua товары и услуги продают тысячи компаний со всей Украины. Покупая товар, вы заказываете его напрямую у одной из компаний. Связаться с компанией можно по контактной информации, указанной на странице товара на Prom.ua и на сайте компании-продавца.
